page.title: 12ECOLOGY-FOOTPATHS-WEATHER
page.content:
FOOTPATH 30/87 Penylan to Tanybanc, Four Roads, starts Meinciau-Penylan road near farm, through fields - passes outside our boundary.
WEATHER
Meinciau is a small village in Dyfed where the climate varies considerably. Summertime is the best time to visit. Rainfall in this area is high - when it drizzles there is hill fog. When driving down into the Gwendraeth Valley you look up towards Meinciau and it's invisible - other times you can see it raining there when it is fine in the valley. Snow is a hazard in winter - the B4309 Pontyates-Carmarthen road is usually closed if there is heavy snow.
